channel.title: azure devops server configuration on Zverev IV
channel.description: Recent content in azure devops server configuration on Zverev IV

item.title: List Azure DevOps Server Features
item.description: First of all: Don’t change states of Features. Especially if you don’t have backups. Especially on Productive Server. You can loss all your data. I warned you. so, if you’re curious enough, run this select in your configuration database: USE "Tfs_Configuration"; SELECT ISNULL(d.[ KEY],a.[ KEY]) AS FeatureKey , CASE WHEN a.AvailabilityState=1 THEN N'Enabled' WHEN a.AvailabilityState=0 THEN N'Disabled' WHEN a.AvailabilityState IS NULL THEN N'Disabled' END AS State , o.Owner , n.Name , d.
